concepts.EXPLAIN_IMPORTANCE_OF_CONTINUING_MEDICAT: Explain importance of continuing medication in case of delayed follow up
concepts.IF_MEDICATION_GOT_OVER_BEFORE_FOLLOW_UP_: If medication got over before follow up ,buy new one
concepts.EXPLAINED_METHOD_OF_OPENING_BOTTLE_WITHO: Explained method of opening bottle without touching nozzle
concepts.EXPLAINED_TO_USE_TWO_DROPS_OF_EACH_MEDIC: Explained to use two drops of each medication
concepts.EXPLAIN_TO_COME_BACK_IMMEDIATELY_IN_CASE: Explain to come back immediately in case of pain/redness/visual reduction
concepts.EXPLAIN_HOW_TO_CHANGE_FOLLOWUP_DATE_IF_R: Explain how to change followup date if required
